We believe that when we all fully understand what we do and what we\u2019re aiming for, we can achieve anything. Which is why, earlier this year, we took a well deserved break to get to know each other and our business better. All 20 members of the Thailand sales team spent a wonderful two days at the Rayong Marriott Resort & Spa where we enjoyed inspiring presentations, team sharing, great food and fun.<\/p>","saveContent":"

wpPost.title: FLS Thailand Sales Workshop

seo.title: FLS Thailand Sales Workshop - FLS
seo.opengraphDescription: We believe that when we all fully understand what we do and what we’re aiming for, we can achieve anything. Which is why, earlier this year, we took a well deserved break to get to know each other and our business better. All 20 members of the Thailand sales team spent a wonderful two days… Continue reading FLS Sale workshop 3

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: We believe that when we all fully understand what we do and what we’re aiming for, we can achieve anything. Which is why, earlier this year, we took a well deserved break to get to know each other and our business better. All 20 members of the Thailand sales team spent a wonderful two days at the Rayong Marriott Resort & Spa where we enjoyed inspiring presentations, team sharing, great food and fun.
